name: mitopia-backend
description: Backend microservices for Mitopia - Your Meeting Utopia

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:signaling" "npm run dev:billing"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:signaling && npm run build:billing
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:signaling && npm run test:billing
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:signaling && npm run lint:billing
scripts.install:python: cd stt && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../translation && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../notes && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.migrate: cd api && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd api && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd api && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.health: curl -f http://localhost:8001/health && curl -f http://localhost:8002/health && curl -f http://localhost:8005/health

author: IchuRisco
